mapper.select: SELECT a.article_id AS id, a.category_id AS category_id, cover, # 文章摘要，如果该字段为空，默认取文章前500个字符作为摘要 if(abstract_content IS NULL OR abstract_content = '', SUBSTR(content, 500), abstract_content) AS article_content, title, status, is_top, is_featured, a.create_time AS create_time, a.update_time AS update_time, nick_name AS author_nickname, avatar AS author_avatar, website AS author_website, tag_name FROM ( # 查询所有文章 SELECT article_id, category_id, user_id, cover, abstract_content, title, content, status, is_top, is_featured, is_delete, create_time, update_time FROM tb_article) a LEFT JOIN tb_article_tag at ON a.article_id = at.article_id LEFT JOIN tb_tag t ON at.tag_id = t.tag_id LEFT JOIN tb_category c ON a.category_id = c.category_id LEFT JOIN tb_user_info ui ON a.user_id = ui.id WHERE a.is_delete = 0 # 文章状态为私密或公开 AND a.status in (1, 2) ORDER BY is_top DESC, is_featured DESC
